edited_stories.edited_story_text: The 4th of July had finally arrived and the family and I were very exited.  The plan was to go to the park, which we have done for years.  This was a great place to gather and see old friends and eat delicious food.  After dark we all gathered around to watch the fireworks.  As always, they were extremely loud.  Followed by a spactacular finale.
